Description: From classical music to punk rock, from disco to jazz, harmony plays a crucial role in a song’s identity.
Excerpt: Chords are groups of notes that form harmony. Most songs follow the same, basic chord formulas, and we’ve broken them down here for you to learn.
Module: Chords 101 - The Building Blocks of Music

Description: A triad is a 3-note chord, the most basic kind of chord.
Excerpt: A triad is a 3-note chord, the most basic kind of chord. In this video you'll learn how to create a triad and play every chord in the key of C.
Module: Chords 101 - The Building Blocks of Music

Description: Some say the most recognizable parts of music are the melody and harmony.
Excerpt: Some say the most recognizable parts of music are the melody and harmony. But the thing that brings music to life is the "Rhythm" — It truly is the Heartbeat of Music. Rhythm works behind the scenes to set a foundation from which harmony and melody can shine, by establishing and building upon "the beat."

Description: In this lesson you'll learn about subdividing, dividing your beats into sections, resulting in smaller and faster notes.
Excerpt: In this lesson you'll learn about subdividing, dividing your beats into sections, resulting in smaller and faster notes.

Description: Learn how to play the Verse & Chorus of ‘Billie Jean’ by Michael Jackson.
Excerpt: Learn how to play the Verse & Chorus of ‘Billie Jean’ by Michael Jackson.
